targets.expr: sum(container_memory_rss{job="kubelet", metrics_path="/metrics/cadvisor", cluster="$cluster", container!=""}) by (namespace) / sum(namespace_memory:kube_pod_container_resource_requests:sum{cluster="$cluster"}) by (namespace)

sum(container_memory_rss{job="kubelet", metrics_path="/metrics/cadvisor", cluster="$cluster", container!=""}) by (namespace) / sum(namespace_memory:kube_pod_container_resource_limits:sum{cluster="$cluster"}) by (namespace)

panels.title: Average Container Bandwidth by Namespace: Received
Average Container Bandwidth by Namespace: Transmitted

targets.expr: sum by(namespace) (rate(container_fs_reads_bytes_total{job="kubelet", metrics_path="/metrics/cadvisor", container!="", cluster="$cluster", namespace=~"$namespace"}[$__rate_interval]) + rate(container_fs_writes_bytes_total{job="kubelet", metrics_path="/metrics/cadvisor", container!="", cluster="$cluster", namespace=~"$namespace"}[$__rate_interval]))
sum by(namespace) (rate(container_fs_reads_bytes_total{job="kubelet", metrics_path="/metrics/cadvisor", container!="", cluster="$cluster", namespace!=""}[$__rate_interval]))
sum by(namespace) (rate(container_fs_writes_bytes_total{job="kubelet", metrics_path="/metrics/cadvisor", container!="", cluster="$cluster", namespace!=""}[$__rate_interval]))

sum by(namespace) (rate(container_fs_reads_bytes_total{job="kubelet", metrics_path="/metrics/cadvisor", container!="", cluster="$cluster", namespace!=""}[$__rate_interval]) + rate(container_fs_writes_bytes_total{job="kubelet", metrics_path="/metrics/cadvisor", container!="", cluster="$cluster", namespace!=""}[$__rate_interval]))
